name: The Revolver
description:
Description: 

Created for Mix and Game Jam 2020! Mixture of Roguelike + Card Games. Each bullet type in the game has its own special property, with randomized colors to keep you guessing match after match. You are limited to holding  6 bullets in your chamber, regardless of type.

Controls:

Left-Click to shoot, Right-Click to discard the bullet in the chamber.

Left-Shift  /  Scroll-Down   & Space /   Scroll-Up   to   spin   chamber.

WASD to move around.

P / ESC to pause, M to mute.
